name: Pavlo Tychyna Uman State Pedagogical University
Medical Academy Named after S.I. Georgievsky of V.I. Vernadsky CFU
info: With the annexation of Crimea by Russia, the university continues to operate as a branch of the Vernadsky Crimean Federal University under the rule of the Russian occupiers.

name: Tavrida National V.I. Vernadsky University
info: Due to the occupation of Crimea by Russia in 2014, the university moved to Kyiv and resumed its work in 2016.

name: Berdiansk State Pedagogical University
info: Due to the occupation of Berdiansk in 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Zaporizhzhia.

name: Dnipro Medical Institute of Conventional and Alternative Medicine
Dnipro National University of Rail Transport
Dnipro State University of Internal Affairs
Oles Honchar Dnipro National University
info: On November 1, 2024, russians shelled Dnipro, hitting the university campus. The attack damaged windows in a dormitory, academic buildings, and a sports complex.

name: Kharkiv National University of Civil Engineering and Architecture
info: On March 2, 2022, the shelling shattered windows and doors of one of the university's buildings. On March 8, 2022, there was a second shelling. There were two hits on the so-called new building on Myronositska Street. Two floors collapsed.

name: Prydniprovska State Academy of Civil Engineering and Architecture
Donetsk National University of Economics and Trade named after Mykhailo Tugan-Baranovsky
info: In September 2014, due to the Russian occupation of Donetsk, it was evacuated to the city of Kryvyi Rih. In 2024, it was reorganized by joining Kryvyi Rih National University.

name: Donbas State Pedagogical University
info: Relocated to Dnipro in May, 2022.

name: Makiivka Institute of Economics and Humanities
info: Relocated to Kramatorsk.

name: Kryvyi Rih State University of Economics and Technology
Donbas National Academy of Civil Engineering and Architecture
info: Due to the Russian occupation of part of Ukraine, the university moved from Makiivka to Kramatorsk, to the buildings of the Donbas State Engineering Academy.

name: Donetsk Law Institute of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine
info: In July 2014, the Donetsk Law Institute of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine was temporarily transferred from Donetsk to Mariupol, and in October 2014, according to the order of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine, it was relocated to Kryvyi Rih. On July 4, 2023, Luhansk State University of Internal Affairs named after Eduard Didorenko, which was moved from Severodonetsk to Mykolaiv in 2014 and to Ivano-Frankivsk in 2022, joined the university.

name: Donetsk National Technical University
info: Was relocated 3 times. In 2014, as a result of the occupation of Donetsk during the Russian-Ukrainian war, the university was moved to Pokrovsk, in 2022 - to Lutsk, in 2024 - to Drohobych.

name: Mariupol State University
info: As a result of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, all buildings of Mariupol State University were completely destroyed. By order of the Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine, the university was relocated to Kyiv, where it resumed its work.

name: Pryazovskyi State Technical University
info: In March 2022, two super-heavy enemy bombs hit the 5th building of the university. Then there were new hits, damage to other buildings, and in some places complete destruction. In April 2022, the university moved to Dnipro, where it resumed its work.

name: Donbass State Engineering Academy
info: In 2022, due to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, the Donbas State Engineering Academy was relocated to Ternopil.

name: H.S. Skovoroda Kharkiv National Pedagogical University
info: On July 6, 2022, the russians hit the university's central building. Three floors collapsed, and windows were smashed in the rest. The missile hit damaged the university's main infrastructure facilities: the scientific library, the museum, the editorial office of the Uchytel newspaper, the rector's department, and the Ukrainian language and literature faculty. The blast wave damaged other university buildings and smashed windows. On November 25, 2024 russia strikes the center of Kharkiv with an S-400 system. The main building of the university was again damaged.

name: Kharkiv College of Textiles and Design
Kharkiv National Automobile and Highway University
Kharkiv National Kotlyarevsky University of Arts
info: On 2 March 2022, the University building came under attack by Russian troops. As a result, the roof, windows, facade decoration, and heating system were damaged.

name: Kharkiv National Medical University
info: The shelling of Kharkiv on the evening of September 20, 2024, once again damaged the university's premises, including the renovated library.

name: O.M. Beketov Kharkiv National University of Urban Economy
info: On February 5, 2023, at 8:20 am, one of the russian missiles hit the central building of the university.  The university sustained significant damage; several floors and laboratory equipment were destroyed, and the Megapolis Research Center was damaged.

name: Kharkiv National University of Economics
info: A strike by an UMPB D-30 aircraft bomb on May 14, 2024, damaged the university buildings.

name: Kharkiv Polytechnic Institute
info: In 2022, Russian missiles destroyed the university's sports complex and the buildings of the Institute of Tank Troops. On the evening of January 10, 2024, 12 university buildings were damaged by missile strikes, and 200 windows were smashed by the blast wave.

name: Kharkiv State Academy of Design and Arts
info: The university's building, which is an architectural monument, was partially damaged (the blast blew out the windows, damaged the roof and is leaking).

name: Kharkiv State Academy of Physical Culture
Kharkiv State University of Food Technology and Trade
National Aerospace University – Kharkiv Aviation Institute
info: The university building was damaged during another shelling on March 28, 2022. The educational laboratories' building was damaged by Russian bombardment on April 1, 17, 19, and 28, 2022. Between February 24, 2022, and July 27, 2023, Russian troops carried out more than 160 strikes on the university's territory.

name: V. N. Karazin National University of Kharkiv
info: The building of the Faculty of Physics and Technology was damaged on February 25, 2022. It was damaged again by another russian strike on March 11, 2022. On March 1, 2022, a blast wave damaged about 400 windows in two buildings. On March 2, 2022, the russians struck the buildings of the Faculty of Economics and the Karazin School of Business. On March 5, 2022, russians attacked the university's sports complex. The shelling also damaged the Karazin Institute of Public Administration, two dormitories, the old library building, and the Museum of Nature. On January 2, 2024, the university suffered significant damage as a result of another russian shelling. On September 20, 2024, a university building was damaged due to a strike. On the night of November 8, 2024, two university buildings were damaged by a russian strike.

name: People Ukrainian Academy
info: On April 17, 2022, a direct missile hit severely damaged one of its academic buildings.

name: V. Dokuchaev Kharkiv National Agrarian University
info: On March 10, 2022, at about 5 a.m., shells hit the university and a dormitory.

name: Yaroslav Mudryi National Law University
info: On January 23, 2024, the shelling of the city center damaged the building of the Academy of Legal Sciences and the university dormitory. This was the sixth university dormitory damaged during the war.

name: Donetsk National Medical University
info: In the fall of 2014, due to the occupation of part of Ukraine by Russians and terrorist paramilitary groups, Donetsk National University changed its legal and actual addresses and relocated to the territory controlled by Ukraine. The legal address is now in Lyman, and the university is now located in Kramatorsk, Kropyvnytskyi and Mariupol.

name: Kyiv National I. K. Karpenko-Kary Theatre, Cinema and Television University
Kyiv National University of Culture and Arts
Kyiv National University of Technologies and Design
Kyiv National University of Trade and Economics
Military Institute of Telecommunications and Information Technologies
National Academy of Fine Art and Architecture
Kharkiv National University of Internal Affairs
info: After numerous shellings, the university lost several buildings, and its territory needs major renovation. In early March 2022, one of the dormitories was completely destroyed. The next attack occurred in August. Then, the educational building with the cadet canteen and large lecture halls was destroyed. It was three S-300 missiles from Russian territory.

name: National University of Life and Environmental Sciences of Ukraine
National University of Ukraine on Physical Education and Sport
Open International University of Human Development "Ukraine"
Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv
info: Since February 24, 2024, the university has been damaged several times by shelling. On the night of November 3, 2024, as a result of a drone attack by the Russian Federation, debris damaged a dormitory. Earlier, on December 31, 2022, the fragments of a warhead of a Russian air-to-ground missile landed near the university sports complex. The force of the blast wave was so powerful that it damaged more than 13 university buildings.  Overall, 5 institutes, 9 faculty buildings, a library, laboratory, sports complex, and several dormitories were damaged for the entire time.

name: Sukhomlynskyi Mykolaiv National University
info: On July 12, 2022, a rocket hit the university. The blast wave smashed out some of the windows of the main building. 5 rockets hit the university on July 15, 2022. The academic buildings and a dormitory were damaged. On August 2, 2022, a rocket hit the dormitory building directly. The academic building was damaged on September 5, 2022; windows, front doors, etc. were smashed. On November 1, 2022, educational buildings were damaged again: the windows and internal doors were smashed, the roof of one of the educational buildings was damaged by the debris, and the suspended ceiling was damaged. Some of the damaged and destroyed buildings were demolished.

name: Ukrainian National Tchaikovsky Academy of Music
Vadym Hetman Kyiv National Economic University
East Ukrainian Volodymyr Dahl National University
info: Until October 2014, the university was located in Luhansk, but due to the occupation of the city by the Russian Federation, the institution was moved to Sievierodonetsk. In February 2022, in connection with Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, the university was relocated to Kamianets-Podilskyi, and in October - to Kyiv. In 2018, Donbas State Technical University, which until 2014 was located in Alchevsk and then in Lysychansk, joined the university. Also, in 2021, Luhansk National Agrarian University was merged with the university, which moved from Luhansk to Kharkiv in 2014 and to Starobilsk in 2018.

name: Luhansk State Medical University
info: Due to the occupation in 2014, the university was moved to Rubizhne. Later, in 2022, due to the hostilities, Luhansk State Medical University moved from Rubizhne to Rivne region.

name: Luhansk State Academy of Culture and Arts
info: In 2014, after the occupation of Luhansk, the university was relocated to Kyiv.

name: Drohobych State Pedagogical University of Ivan Franko
Ivan Franko National University of Lviv
Lviv National Stepan Gzhytsky University of Veterinary Medicine and Biotechnology
Lviv State University of Physical Culture
Lviv University of Trade and Economics
National Forestry and Wood Technology University of Ukraine
Admiral Makarov National University of Shipbuilding
info: On July 15, 2022, a Russian missile hit a university building. At night, on October 10, 2022, the enemy once again fired on the city of Mykolaiv with S-300 missiles, and the university was hit again.

name: Filatov Institute of Eye Diseases and Tissue Therapy
K. D. Ushinsky South Ukrainian National Pedagogical University
Petro Mohyla Black Sea State University
info: The first hits on university territory occurred in March 2022. A rocket fell on a hospital near the university buildings. The blast wave smashed windows, and the ceiling collapsed. On the night of August 17, 2022, two S-300 missiles hit the university's main building. Russians launched two more rockets at the university on the night of August 19. As a result of the hit, part of the front wall of the main building was destroyed.  On August 29, a russian missile hit the roof of the building, penetrated several floors, and landed near the rector's office and the Academic Council.

name: National University Odesa Law Academy
info: As a result of enemy shelling on April 29, 2024, the Palace of Students of the National University Odesa Law Academy caught fire.

name: Odesa Maritime Academy
info: On the night of February 01, 2025, a university dormitory was damaged by a Russian missile attack.

name: Odesa National Academy of Technologies
info: On November 14, 2024, the shelling damaged the university's academic buildings. The shock wave smashed windows on four floors of the building, which houses classrooms, computer labs, and laboratories of four university institutes. Windows, educational equipment and premises were damaged.

name: Odesa National Academy of Telecommunications
info: On August 14, 2023, a nighttime Russian attack damaged the university building, with more than 170 windows smashed by a shock wave.

name: Odesa National Medical University
info: In 2023, a rocket attack damaged the university building.

name: Odesa National Polytechnic University
info: The university was damaged during a Russian attack on June 14, 2023. The blast wave damaged 1782 windows in the higher education institution.

name: Odesa Mechnikov National University
info: On November 14, 2024, a shock wave damaged a significant number of windows in the main building of the university, in the building of the Faculty of Chemistry and Pharmacy. The windows in the Big Chemistry and Big Physics classrooms and in one of the halls of the Paleontological Museum were damaged. There is also some damage to the dormitory.

name: Kremenchuk Flight College of National Aviation University
Poltava National Technical Yuri Kondratyuk University
Poltava National V. G. Korolenko Pedagogical University
Poltava University of Economics and Trade
University of Luhansk
info: University was forcibly relocated to Ukraine-controlled Starobilsk in 2014 and, beginning in 2022, was later relocated to Poltava, Myrhorod, and Lubny, due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

name: Ternopil Ivan Puluj National Technical University
Vasyl Stus Donetsk National University
info: In September 2014, due to the war in eastern Ukraine, the Ministry of Education and Science announced the relocation of the university from Donetsk to Vinnytsia. On November 3, 2014, the university started the academic year in Vinnytsia.

name: Vinnytsia State Pedagogical University of Mykhailo Kotsyubynsky
Bogdan Khmelnitsky Melitopol State Pedagogical University
info: Due to the occupation of Melitopol in 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Zaporizhzhia.

name: Tavria State Agrotechnological University
info: Due to the occupation of Melitopol in 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Zaporizhzhia.

name: Kherson State Maritime Academy
info: Due to the occupation of Kherson from 2 March 2022 until 11 November 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Odesa. The university building was repeatedly shelled by the russian army. On December 20, 2022, during the shelling of the city, one of the dormitories was damaged. On January 1, 2023, the shelling severely damaged one of the walls of the university swimming pool building. On November 7, 2024, the walls and roof were damaged, classrooms and an assembly hall were destroyed. January 5, 2025, a russian attack damaged the university building. The walls and classrooms were smashed, windows and doors were broken.

name: Kherson State Agrarian and Economic University
info: Due to the occupation of Kherson from 2 March 2022 until 11 November 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Kropyvnytskyi.

name: Kherson State University
info: Due to the occupation of Kherson from 2 March 2022 until 11 November 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Ivano-Frankivsk. The university's original building was first shelled on the eve of March 8, 2022. On New Year's Eve (2023), the main building and the university swimming pool were damaged by Russian massive shelling. The constant attacks caused damage to dormitories and all academic buildings.

name: Kherson National Technical University
info: Due to the occupation of Kherson from 2 March 2022 until 11 November 2022, the university was temporarily moved to Khmelnytskyi.

name: Zaporizhzhia National University
info: The explosion on March 16, 2022 damaged 150 windows in the university buildings. Two dormitories and 2 buildings of the educational institution and the dining room were damaged. As a result of the shelling on February 5, 2025, the university was again severely damaged. Windows and roofs in three buildings were damaged. Ceilings and walls were damaged, laboratories and classrooms were partially destroyed.

name: Donetsk State University of Management
info: There is no information about what happened to the university after February 24, 2022, as most of Mariupol was wiped off the map and most of the population was killed by Russians.

name: Chernihiv Polytechnic National University
info: On April 17, 2024, the central building of the university was damaged by a blast wave as a result of a missile attack on Chernihiv.

name: Dnipro National University of Rail Transport
Ivano-Frankivsk National Technical University of Oil and Gas
info: The university was damaged as a result of a nighttime missile attack by the russia on June 22, 2024

name: Ivan Kozhedub National University of the Air Force
Kharkiv National University of Radioelectronics
info: The university building was damaged in early 2024 as a result of a rocket attack on Bakulin Street.

name: Kyiv National University of Construction and Architecture
Crimea State Medical University named after S. I. Georgievsky
Danylo Halytsky Lviv National Medical University
Hlukhiv National Pedagogical University of Oleksandr Dovzhenko
Kryvyi Rih State Pedagogical University
info: In June 2023, a rocket hit a residential building near the humanitarian building.

name: Luhansk Taras Shevchenko National Pedagogical University
Kyiv State Institute of Decorative Art And Design Named M. Boychuk
info: On March 26, 2024, a morning rocket attack on Kyiv destroyed part of the university building. An employee of the institution was injured in the strike, and many artworks of the Academy's teachers and students were buried in the rubble, some of them irretrievably destroyed. The Academy's gym, congress hall and exhibition center were completely destroyed. Several classrooms and departmental premises were damaged.

name: Ternopil Volodymyr Hnatyuk National Pedagogical University
Hetman Petro Sahaidachnyi National Ground Forces Academy
Karpenko-Karyi University of Cheater, Cinema and Television
University of the State Fiscal Service of Ukraine
info: Irpin (the city where the university is located) was occupied from February 27 to March 28, 2022. Due to active hostilities, 6 student dormitories, 4 academic and administrative buildings, and a sports complex were destroyed. Overall, 50% of the infrastructure was partially or completely destroyed.

name: State Biotechnology University
info: On March 8, 2022, a Russian missile attack damaged the building's facade and interiors.
